text:
Message 149 of 4024
If I had known in advance that you were going to take both New Year’s Eve and New Year’s Day I would have brought this up. Apologies for that.
But we are where we are.
Today the national semifinal game is on featuring Alabama v Michigan. If AD is not busy I am offering that he can come watch it and we work on
our projects.
I can pick up, bring home. Whatever. If you say no, that’s no. I am not arguing or expecting to be on here for anything else today. This is your time
and I’ll respect that.
Thanks
Sent:01/01/2024 at 11:38 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 12:18 PM)
Subject:Alabama Game
Message 150 of 4024
Just remembered that you said you wanted the kids so you could take them skiing today, so might not have access to this. I assume the backside is
closed so maybe so.
Either way please do not alter your return plans in any way if the answer is yes. I don’t want to mess with your big ski day. But it is late in the
afternoon so still works out.
Thanks
Sent:01/01/2024 at 12:04 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 12:18 PM)
Subject:Re: Alabama Game
Message 151 of 4024
Adrian said yes. I’m driving Max to tusker now so Adrian is home for pick up.
Can you drop off before 4:30. There are plans to watch Huskys game tonight at Dylan’s.
Sent:01/01/2024 at 12:20 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 12:20 PM)
Subject:Re: Alabama Game
Message 152 of 4024
So...
the games go back to back with a delay in between. They are coordinated and I will be watching. So Alabama starts at 2:00. The other game will not
start till it’s over.
Sent:01/01/2024 at 12:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/01/2024 at 12:27 PM)
Subject:Re: Alabama Game
